message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I had in mind.  How about we meet halfway between our two offers at $16,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $16,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can you meet me at that price?
